allPostsData.title: Standalone SQL Log Analyser
allPostsData.description: A standalone web app that parses the SQL queries from the log and categorises them by tables and query types.

allPostsData.title: Pros and cons of transitioning to a remote job
allPostsData.description: The good and the bad things when you transition from a regular office job to remote job like shrinking social circle, depression, freedom to travel etc

allPostsData.title: RubyGem: Compare YML
allPostsData.description: A Ruby gem to compare YAML or JSON files to find the diff in the keys (with support extending to deeply nested key comparisons).
